WorkItem.Description:
Hello,
 
I am trying to develop an application using the Map control, but every time I use the OpenStreetMapServer the application crashes, and so does the VisualStudio 2010  weach I am using  !  I am using the Map control in mode "CACHE ONLY".
 
I am using the latest D3 Version (31108) on an XP operated desktop with service pack 3.
 
Any Help will be greatly appreciated !
 
Yours
Oren
WorkItem.Summary: Application Crashes When Using Map Control !
